p: The results of all experiments were expressed as mean ± standard deviation. Analysis of variance was performed by ANOVA procedure and Duncan’s multiple comparison test was used to determine any significant differences ( p < 0.05) identified between treatments. The correlation (r) between the two variants was analyzed using the Pearson test. The statistical analyses were performed using SPSS software (SPSS v.25 for windows; IBM Crop., Armonk, NY, USA).
